Package com.orientechnologies.orient.core.command.script

Class OScriptManager

java.lang.Object
com.orientechnologies.orient.core.command.script.OScriptManager
public class OScriptManager extends Object
Executes Script Commands.
Author:
Luca Garulli (l.garulli--(at)--orientdb.com)

    • getLibrary

      public String getLibrary(ODatabase<?> db, String iLanguage)
      Formats the library of functions for a language.
      Parameters:
      db - Current database instance
      iLanguage - Language as filter
      Returns:
      String containing all the functions

    • existsEngine

    • acquireDatabaseEngine

      public ScriptEngine acquireDatabaseEngine(String databaseName, String language)
      Acquires a database engine from the pool. Once finished using it, the instance MUST be returned in the pool by calling the method #releaseDatabaseEngine(String, ScriptEngine).
      Parameters:
      databaseName - Database name
      language - Script language
      Returns:
      ScriptEngine instance with the function library already parsed
      See Also:
      • releaseDatabaseEngine(String, String, ScriptEngine)

    • releaseDatabaseEngine

      public void releaseDatabaseEngine(String iLanguage, String iDatabaseName, ScriptEngine poolEntry)
      Acquires a database engine from the pool. Once finished using it, the instance MUST be returned in the pool by calling the method
      Parameters:
      iLanguage - Script language
      iDatabaseName - Database name
      poolEntry - Pool entry to free
      See Also:
      • acquireDatabaseEngine(String, String)
